text: pretty sure you can do that?
Well, I believe you can inherited_value: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/module-theme-fields-overview#inherited-fields>
Awesome, I could’ve sworn I’d tried that before and it wasn’t working in modules, only global theme settings. Thanks!
Didn’t there used to be a reset icon button on module fields that have been manually modified, like in global theme settings? :thinking_face: I think there definitely should be.
